original: 常山郡人，魏文帝曹丕宮人，又名薛夜來。《拾遺記》中記載有「紅淚」典故，又擅針黹女紅，號為針神。另，曉霞妝，即斜紅，相傳也與其有關。
text: A native of Changshan County, a native of Cao Pi Palace of Emperor Wei Wen, also known as Xue Yelai. There is an allusion of 'Red Tears' in the 'Supplementary Notes', and he is also good at needle-stitching female red, whose name is needle god. In addition, Xiaoxia makeup, namely oblique red, is also related to it.
